title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 333.1 - Policy and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 333.1 - Policy and scope

State Regulations

Pursuant to the authority vested in the Office of General

Services by sections 175-a and 175-b of the State Finance Law, the following
policies, procedures and guidelines relating to the services provided by the
visually or other severely handicapped and offered for sale to the State, or
any governmental agency or political subdivision or public benefit corporation
thereof having its own purchasing agency, are hereby established. It is the
policy of the Office of General Services to facilitate the award of service
contracts issued by the above-mentioned governmental agencies to
nonprofitmaking organizations established for the express purposes of aiding
the economic and social well-being of the visually and other severely
handicapped. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
333.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
